entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Soul-sucking creatures that are repelled by Patronus charms

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: A magical charm that takes the form of an animal and repels dementors

entities.name: prongs
entities.description: Harry's father, who was a werewolf and transformed into a stag

entities.name: moony
entities.description: One of the Marauders, a group of friends that included James Potter (Prongs)

entities.name: marauder's map
entities.description: A magical map that shows the location of everyone in Hogwarts

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: A magical cloak that makes the wearer invisible

relationships.description: Lupin gave Harry back the Invisibility Cloak
